title: Managed to get 2 banners for Shotcalling/tilt proof and a 14 day ban within 5-8 games
body:
No mutes, Low priority or 1 day bans either, straight to 14. 

Glad to see this games still a mess.

Low priority queue is reserved for leaver buster punishments only. 

The punishment system has four tiers and typically escalate over time:

* First Offense: 10 Game Chat Restriction
* Second Offense: 25 Game Chat Restriction
* Third Offense: Two Week Suspension
* Fourth Offense: Permanent Suspension

However, it is possible to skip to a Two Week or Permanent suspension based on the severity of the behavior in the game. Excessive negative behavior can result in a Two-Week or Permanent suspension at any time without having a chat restriction on the account. 

You must have done or said something that the community deems pretty awful to have been jumped straight to a 14 day. Provide us your chat logs and we can tell you what it was.
